<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mirror Robe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1319)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 50

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn clothing

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Thousands of small, reflective, mirrored glass shards have been carefully stitched down this long silk duster.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;    **Requirements** The _mirror robe_ was last activated to draw attention toward you, or you haven't used the _mirror robe_ today; **Effect** The _mirror robe_ [Creates a Diversion](/Actions.aspx?ID=45) for you with a +9 [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) modifier.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact ([visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163))   **Requirements** The _mirror robe_ was last activated to divert attention away from you and you are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) or [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39) by at least one foe; **Effect** You draw attention toward yourself. Choose one foe to which you were hidden or undetected. You reveal yourself to all, becoming [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27). The foe you chose diverts its attention to you, becoming [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to your allies until the beginning of your next turn. If you are [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) or otherwise can't become observed, you can't use this activation.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
